title.rendered: Kutch Railway Company Limited supports Smile Foundation’s Mission Education Programme

content.rendered:
Kutch Railway Company Limited supports Smile Foundation's Mission Education Programme

Kutch Railway Company Limited entered into an MoU with Smile Foundation for the implementation of their CSR project in Education. The main objective of the project is to improve learning outcomes among students in the government schools through a quality intervention model. As part of the Mission Education project, 400 children from 4 Government schools located in Palanpur city (Banaskantha district), Gujarat are being supported.

The key aspects pertaining to the project include:
• Intensive and rigorous engagement of students in ME through:
1. Classroom teaching-learning sessions integrated in the school timetable
2. Integration of tablets in daily teaching-learning sessions
3. Capacity building of teachers in pedagogical aspects and assessment strategies
4. Physical fitness and socio-emotional well-being sessions
5. Value education sessions and celebration of important days
6. Wholesome engagement by conducting exposure visits and health check-ups/health awareness sessions
• Provision of infrastructural and nutritional support to ME Schools
